content: "Multi-class Image Anomaly Detection for Practical Applications" accepted at Neurocomputing!
"Normalizing flow-based latent space mapping for implicit pattern authentication" published in Applied Soft Computing.
Started Ph.D. program at Seoul National University, Department of Industrial Engineering.
Received M.S. degree from Korea University, Department of Industrial and Management Engineering.
"Exploring the differences in adversarial robustness between ViT- and CNN-based models" published in CVIU.
Achieved 3rd place in Dense Video Captioning Challenge at CVPR LOVEU Workshop!
Started M.S. program at Korea University, Department of Industrial and Management Engineering.
"Prediction of Intracranial Aneurysm Risk using Machine Learning" published in Scientific Reports.
"Machine learning for detecting moyamoya disease in plain skull radiography" published in EBioMedicine.
Received B.S. degree from University of Suwon.
Joined Seoul National University Bundang Hospital as AI Researcher.
